amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 127, which prevents the IRS from issuing guidance to more clearly define political activity for 501(c)(4) organizations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Becerra amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 359).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Becerra amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 359).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Becerra.
